heading: Issue tracking software
paragraph: Tried, tested, and reviewed by the community

productCards.title: Linear â€” Manage software development and track bugs
productCards.description: Manage software development and track bugs. Linear's streamlined design is built for speed and efficiency to help high performing teams accomplish great things.

productCards.title: GitHub â€” How people build software
productCards.description: GitHub is a development platform inspired by the way you work.

productCards.title: JIRA â€” How teams do great
productCards.description: Create and track feedback for Atlassian products.

productCards.title: Trello â€” Visual collaboration with a shared perspective on projects
productCards.description: Trello is a web-based Kanban-style list-making application. Originally made by Fog Creek Software in 2011, it was spun out to form the basis of a separate company in 2014 and later sold to Atlassian in January 2017.

productCards.title: Sentry â€” Application monitoring and error tracking software
productCards.description: Self-hosted and cloud-based application monitoring that helps software teams see clearer, solve quicker, & learn continuously.

productCards.title: Asana â€” Track, manage, and connect your projects across any team
productCards.description: Stay on track, keep projects organized, and hit deadlines. See project progress, track individual tasks, plan sprints, integrate with other tools, and achieve successful launches.

productCards.title: Features.Vote â€” Listen to your users. Know what to build next.
productCards.description: Let your users post and vote on features they want, driving your product's growth with precision and clarity. ðŸš€

productCards.title: LogRocket â€” Stop guessing why bugs happen
productCards.description: LogRocket helps product teams build better experiences for their users. By recording videos of user sessions along with logs and network data, LogRocket surfaces UX problems and reveals the root cause of every bug.

productCards.title: GitHub Actions â€” Automate your workflow from idea to production
productCards.description: GitHub Actions makes it easy to automate all your software workflows, now with world-class CI/CD. Build, test, and deploy your code right from GitHub. Make code reviews, branch management, and issue triaging work the way you want.

productCards.title: EnlightUp â€” Enhance your products with customer feedback
productCards.description: Collect feedback from customers in one place to make better product decisions.
